text: Ara duti sagara ekasamana naya, e'i ekati bisud'dha, trsnanibaraka, yara panakarana sumista, ara e'iti lona, bisbada. Tabu'o tadera pratyekati theke tomara tataka mansa kha'o, ara bera kare ano alankara ya tomara paro. Ara tumi dekhate pa'o jahajagulo tate bukacire calache yena tomara tamra karunabhandara theke rojagara karate paro, ara yena tomara krtajnata jnapana karo.
